thread.title: Advisory - Boralex - Release of the 2017 Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year-End Financial Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Advisory - Boralex - Release of the 2017 Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year-End Financial Results
text:
MONTRÉAL, Feb. 2, 2018 /PRNewswire/ - Boralex Inc. (" Boralex " or the " Corporation ") announces that the release of the 2017 fourth quarter and fiscal yearend results will take place on March, 2 2018.
Financial analysts are invited to attend a conference call during which the financial results will be presented.
Date and time:
Friday, March 2, 2018 at 10:00 a.m. ET
Dial-in numbers:
1-888-231-8191 or 647-427-7450
Media and other interested individuals are invited to listen to the conference and view a presentation which will be broadcasted live and on a deferred basis on the Boralex corporate website at www.boralex.com . A full replay will also be available by dialing toll free at 1-855-859-2056 until March 9, 2018. The access code is 50651298, followed by the pound sign (#).
The financial information will be released through a press release and on the Boralex's website on March 2, 2018 at 7:00 a.m.
About Boralex
Boralex develops, builds and operates renewable energy power facilities in Canada, France and the United States. A leader in the Canadian market and France's largest independent producer of onshore wind power, the Corporation is recognized for its solid experience in optimizing its asset base in four power generation types — wind, hydroelectric, thermal and solar. Boralex ensures sustained growth by leveraging the expertise and diversification developed over the past 25 years. Boralex's shares and convertible debentures are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the ticker symbols BLX and BLX.DB.A, respectively. More information is available at www.boralex.com or www.sedar.com .
SOURCE Boralex Inc.
